data.title: The Project Gutenberg eBook of Democracy in America, Part I. by Alexis de Tocqueville
data.text:
*** START OF THE PROJECT GUTENBERG EBOOK 815 ***

DEMOCRACY IN AMERICA

By Alexis De Tocqueville

ETC., ETC.

Translated by

Henry Reeve, Esq.

IN TWO VOLUMES.

VOL. I.

LONDON:

SAUNDERS AND OTLEY, CONDUIT STREET

1835
